tier.tier-desc: A bar of Algedian silver.

A processed strip of hide, used in trade skills.

Found in sand deposits, or ground from sandstone, sand is useful in creating glass products.

Raw dark azulyte crystals energized through the power of essence, these crystals continually break down and reform themselves as the magic pulses within them. This process emits powerful magics that allow the disk to defy gravity and fly despite heavy weights.
